allow: Bash(echo "=== Testing Couriers Endpoint ===" curl -s "http://localhost:8000/api/v1/fleet/couriers/?limit=2" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN")
Bash(echo -e "\n\n=== Testing Vehicle History Endpoint ===" curl -s "http://localhost:8000/api/v1/fleet/vehicles/1/history" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN")
Bash(echo "=== Checking an assignment with related data ===" curl -s "http://localhost:8000/api/v1/fleet/assignments/?limit=5" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN")
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ echo "=== Testing BigQuery Health Endpoint ===")
Bash(echo "=== Testing BigQuery data for BARQ_ID 3 ===" curl -s "http://localhost:8000/api/v1/integrations/bigquery/courier/3" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN")
